attributes.action: Re-elect all MP's quilty of fraudulent expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a member of the Great British Public I would like this petition to Re-elect all MP's quilty of fraudulent expense claims. We have lost all confidence in Paliment being able to conduct itself,  in this very serious situation of MP's expenses. Once proud of our nation and what it stands for, we are about to become the laughing stock of the world. Unless something is done now.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/

This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
